conversations.body_text: Hi Salvatore Mirabile,    Your order has been shipped, but we did not send you a shipping notification in a timely manner. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Hi there, Can you please refund the express shipping cost as I'm still waiting for the pedals! I'm not happy! Kind regards, Sal
